trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick Scene Graph's renderer supports batching of geometry to reduce the number of draw calls. See the Scene Graph pages for details. This relies on injecting code to the vertex shader's main() function. In Qt 5.x this happened at run time, by modifying the supplied GLSL vertex shader code. In Qt 6 that is not an option. Instead, batchable variants of vertex shaders can be built by the qsb tool. This is requested by the -b argument. When the input is not a vertex shader with .vert extension, it has no effect. For vertex shaders however, it will lead to generating to versions for each target. Qt Quick will then automatically pick the right variant (standard or batchable) at run time.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick Scene Graph的渲染器支持几何图形批处理，以减少绘制调用的次数。有关详细信息，请参见“场景图”页面。这依赖于将代码注入到顶点着色器的main（）函数中。在Qt 5.x中，这是在运行时通过修改提供的GLSL顶点着色器代码而发生的。在Qt 6中，这不是一个选择。取而代之的是，可以通过 qsb 工具构建可批量着色的顶点着色器。这是 -b 参数所要求的。当输入不是扩展名为 .vert 的顶点着色器时，则无效。但是，对于顶点着色器，这将导致为每个目标生成版本。然后Qt Quick将在运行时自动选择正确的变体（标准或可批处理）。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick Timeline module enables keyframe-based animations and parameterization. This module is directly supported by Qt Design Studio and Qt Quick Designer, with a timeline editor to create keyframe-based animations.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick Timeline模块可以实现基于关键帧的动画和参数化。该模块由Qt Design Studio和Qt Quick Designer直接支持,通过时间线编辑器来创建基于关键帧的动画。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick items in a QML scene populate a tree of QSGNode instances. Once created, this tree is a complete description of how a certain frame should be rendered. It does not contain any references back to the Qt Quick items at all and will on most platforms be processed and rendered in a separate thread. The renderer is a self contained part of the scene graph which traverses the QSGNode tree and uses geometry defined in QSGGeometryNode and shader state defined in QSGMaterial to schedule OpenGL state change and draw calls.
trans-unit.target: QML场景中的Qt Quick项目将填充QSGNode实例树。创建后，该树是如何渲染特定帧的完整描述。它根本不包含任何对Qt Quick项目的引用，并且在大多数平台上都将在单独的线程中进行处理和呈现。该渲染器是场景图横过的自包含部分QSGNode树和用途几何定义QSGGeometryNode和定义着色器状态QSGMaterial安排OpenGL的状态变化并绘制调用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick items in a QML scene populate a tree of QSGNode instances. Once created, this tree is a complete description of how a certain frame should be rendered. It does not contain any references back to the Qt Quick items at all and will on most platforms be processed and rendered in a separate thread. The renderer is a self contained part of the scene graph which traverses the QSGNode tree and uses geometry defined in QSGGeometryNode and shader state defined in QSGMaterial to update the graphics state and generate draw calls.
trans-unit.target: QML场景中的Qt Quick项填充了QSGNode实例树。创建后，此树是如何渲染特定帧的完整描述。它根本不包含任何对Qt Quick项目的引用，并且在大多数平台上都将在单独的线程中进行处理和呈现。该渲染器是场景图横过的自包含部分QSGNode树和用途几何定义QSGGeometryNode和定义着色器状态QSGMaterial更新图形状态，并产生绘图调用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick module is the standard library for writing QML applications. While the Qt QML module provides the QML engine and language infrastructure, the Qt Quick module provides all the basic types necessary for creating user interfaces with QML. It provides a visual canvas and includes types for creating and animating visual components, receiving user input, creating data models and views and delayed object instantiation.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick模块是用于编写QML应用程序的标准库。虽然Qt的QML模块提供QML引擎和语言基础设施方面，Qt Quick的模块提供了所有必要的与QML创建用户界面的基本类型。它提供了一个视觉画布，并包括用于创建和动画化视觉组件，接收用户输入，创建数据模型和视图以及延​​迟对象实例化的类型。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick module provides both a QML API which supplies QML types for creating user interfaces with the QML language, and a C++ API for extending QML applications with C++ code.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick模块既提供了QML API（用于提供使用QML语言创建用户界面的QML类型），又提供了C ++ API（用于使用C ++代码扩展QML应用程序）。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick module provides both a QML API which supplies QML types for creating user interfaces with the QML language, and a C++ API for extending QML applications with C++ code.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick模块既提供了QML API（用于提供使用QML语言创建用户界面的QML类型），又提供了C ++ API（用于使用C ++代码扩展QML应用程序）。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick module provides both a QML API which supplies QML types for creating user interfaces with the QML language, and a C++ API for extending QML applications with C++ code.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick模块既提供了QML API（用于提供使用QML语言创建用户界面的QML类型），又提供了C ++ API（用于使用C ++代码扩展QML应用程序）。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Remote Objects module also includes qmake variables (REPC_SOURCE, REPC_REPLICA, and REPC_MERGED) that can be added to your project file to automatically run repc, and add the resulting files to the list of files processed by Meta Object Compiler during the build process, making use of Qt Remote Objects in your projects simple.
trans-unit.target: Qt远程对象模块还包括qmake变量（REPC_SOURCE，REPC_REPLICA和REPC_MERGED），可以将其添加到您的项目文件中以自动运行repc，并将生成的文件添加到在构建过程中由Meta Object Compiler处理的文件列表中，在您的项目中简化Qt远程对象的使用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Remote Objects module also includes qmake variables (REPC_SOURCE, REPC_REPLICA, and REPC_MERGED) that can be added to your project file to automatically run repc, and add the resulting files to the list of files processed by Meta Object Compiler during the build process, making use of Qt Remote Objects in your projects simple.
trans-unit.target: Qt远程对象模块还包括qmake变量（REPC_SOURCE，REPC_REPLICA和REPC_MERGED），可以将其添加到您的项目文件中以自动运行repc，并将生成的文件添加到在构建过程中由Meta Object Compiler处理的文件列表中，在您的项目中简化Qt远程对象的使用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Remote Objects module provides an easy way to share Qt APIs between processes and devices. For this to work, we require a data channel between processes and devices. To establish this data channel, first, you need a QRemoteObjectNode.
trans-unit.target: Qt远程对象模块提供了一种在进程和设备之间共享Qt API的简便方法。为此，我们需要流程和设备之间的数据通道。要建立此数据通道，首先，您需要一个QRemoteObjectNode。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Resource System
trans-unit.target: Qt资源系统

trans-unit.source: The Qt SAX2 implementation can report whether the reader has particular functionality using the QXmlReader::hasFeature() function. Available features can be tested with QXmlReader::feature(), and switched on or off using QXmlReader::setFeature().
trans-unit.target: Qt SAX2实现可以使用QXmlReader :: hasFeature（）函数报告阅读器是否具有特定功能。可用的功能可以使用QXmlReader :: feature（）进行测试，并可以使用QXmlReader :: setFeature（）打开或关闭。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SCXML implementation extends SCXML in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: Qt SCXML的实现以下列方式扩展了SCXML。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SCXML implementation is SCXML compliant, with a few exceptions:
trans-unit.target: Qt SCXML的实现是符合SCXML标准的,但有一些例外。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SCXML module provides functionality to create state machines from SCXML files. This includes both dynamically creating state machines (loading the SCXML file and instantiating states and transitions) and generating a C++ file that has a class implementing the state machine. It also contains functionality to support data models and executable content.
trans-unit.target: Qt SCXML模块提供了从SCXML文件创建状态机的功能。这包括动态创建状态机（加载SCXML文件以及实例化状态和转换），以及生成具有实现状态机的类的C ++文件。它还包含支持数据模型和可执行内容的功能。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SCXML module provides functionality to create state machines from SCXML files. This includes both dynamically creating state machines (loading the SCXML file and instantiating states and transitions) and generating a C++ file that has a class implementing the state machine. It also contains functionality to support data models and executable content.
trans-unit.target: Qt SCXML模块提供了从SCXML文件创建状态机的功能。这既包括动态创建状态机（加载SCXML文件以及实例化状态和转换），也包括生成具有实现状态机类的C ++文件。它还包含支持数据模型和可执行内容的功能。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SQL module provides support for SQL databases. Qt SQL's APIs are divided into different layers:
trans-unit.target: Qt SQL模块提供了对SQL数据库的支持。Qt SQL的API分为不同的层次。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SQL module uses driver plugins to communicate with the different database APIs. Since Qt's SQL Module API is database-independent, all database-specific code is contained within these drivers. Several drivers are supplied with Qt, and other drivers can be added. The driver source code is supplied and can be used as a model for writing your own drivers.
trans-unit.target: Qt SQL模块使用驱动程序插件与不同的数据库API通信。由于Qt的SQL模块API与数据库无关，因此所有特定于数据库的代码都包含在这些驱动程序中。Qt提供了几个驱动程序，并且可以添加其他驱动程序。提供了驱动程序源代码，可以将其用作编写自己的驱动程序的模型。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SQL module uses driver plugins to communicate with the different database APIs. Since Qt's SQL Module API is database-independent, all database-specific code is contained within these drivers. Several drivers are supplied with Qt, and other drivers can be added. The driver source code is supplied and can be used as a model for writing your own drivers.
trans-unit.target: Qt SQL模块使用驱动程序插件与不同的数据库API进行通信。由于Qt的SQL模块API与数据库无关，因此所有特定于数据库的代码都包含在这些驱动程序中。Qt提供了几个驱动程序，并且可以添加其他驱动程序。提供了驱动程序源代码，可以将其用作编写自己的驱动程序的模型。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Sensors - Grue Sensor Example demonstrates creation of a sensor backend
trans-unit.target: Qt Sensors-Grue Sensor 示例演示了传感器后台的创建。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Sensors API has a front end, for application developers to use and a back end, where device implementors write code to access their hardware. As an application developer you do not need to access the back end though it may be useful to understand how it works.
trans-unit.target: Qt Sensors API有一个前端,供应用开发者使用,还有一个后端,设备实现者在后端写代码来访问他们的硬件。作为应用开发者,你不需要访问后端,但了解它的工作原理可能会很有用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Sensors API provides access to sensor hardware via QML and C++ interfaces. The Qt Sensors API also provides a motion gesture recognition API for devices.
trans-unit.target: Qt Sensors API通过QML和C++接口提供对传感器硬件的访问。Qt Sensors API还为设备提供了运动手势识别API。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Sensors module's APIs allow access to various hardware sensors. Accelerometers, light sensors, compass, and gyroscope sensors are one of the many types of sensors supported by the QML and C++ APIs.
trans-unit.target: Qt Sensors模块的API允许访问各种硬件传感器。加速计、光传感器、罗盘和陀螺仪传感器是QML和C++API支持的众多类型的传感器之一。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Serial Bus API provides classes and functions to access the various industrial serial buses and protocols, such as CAN, ModBus, and others.
trans-unit.target: Qt串行总线API提供了访问各种工业串行总线和协议的类和函数,如CAN、ModBus等。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Shader Tools module builds on the SPIR-V Open Source Ecosystem as described at the Khronos SPIR-V web site. For compiling into SPIR-V glslang is used, while translating and reflecting is done via SPIRV-Cross.
trans-unit.target: 如Khronos SPIR-V网站所述，Qt Shader Tools模块基于SPIR-V开源生态系统构建。为了编译成SPIR-V ，使用glslang，而翻译和反射是通过SPIRV-Cross完成的。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Test module provides classes for unit testing Qt applications and libraries. All public methods are in the QTest namespace. In addition, the QSignalSpy class provides easy introspection for Qt's signals and slots, and the QAbstractItemModelTester allows for non-destructive testing of item models.
trans-unit.target: Qt测试模块提供用于对Qt应用程序和库进行单元测试的类。所有公共方法都在QTest命名空间中。此外，QSignalSpy类为Qt的信号和插槽提供了自省功能，而QAbstractItemModelTester允许对项目模型进行非破坏性测试。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Virtual Keyboard project is a Qt 5 input context plugin which implements QPlatformInputContextPlugin and QPlatformInputContext interfaces. These interfaces allow the plugin to be used as a platform input context plugin in Qt 5 applications.
trans-unit.target: Qt Virtual Keyboard项目是一个Qt 5输入上下文插件,它实现了QPlatformInputContextPlugin和QPlatformInputContext接口。这些接口允许该插件在Qt 5应用程序中作为平台输入上下文插件使用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Virtual Keyboard project provides an input framework and reference keyboard frontend for Qt 5 on Linux Desktop/X11, Windows Desktop, and Boot2Qt targets.
trans-unit.target: Qt虚拟键盘项目为Linux Desktop / X11，Windows Desktop和Boot2Qt目标上的Qt 5提供了输入框架和参考键盘前端。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Virtual Keyboard supports third-party plugins from the following vendors:
trans-unit.target: Qt虚拟键盘支持以下厂商的第三方插件。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor can be used from C++ or QML:
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland Compositor可以从C++或QML中使用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor includes features necessary to create a compositor:
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland Compositor包含了创建一个合成器所需的功能。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor is a module that provides convenient and powerful QML and C++ APIs for developing custom display servers based on the Wayland protocol. The display server, often called a compositor, displays content from client applications that support the Wayland protocol.
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland合成器是一个模块，该模块提供了方便而强大的QML和C ++ API，用于开发基于Wayland协议的自定义显示服务器。显示服务器（通常称为合成器）显示来自支持Wayland协议的客户端应用程序的内容。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor is an API for building your own compositor. It gives you full freedom to build a custom compositor UI and manage the windows of various clients. You can combine both Qt Quick and QML with the Qt Wayland Compositor to create impressive, imaginative UIs. For more information, see Qt Wayland Compositor.
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland合成器是用于构建自己的合成器的API。它为您提供了构建自定义合成器UI和管理各种客户端窗口的完全自由。您可以将Qt Quick和QML与Qt Wayland Compositor结合使用，以创建令人印象深刻的，富有想象力的UI。有关更多信息，请参见Qt Wayland Compositor。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor is an API for building your own compositor. It gives you full freedom to build a custom compositor UI and manage the windows of various clients. You can combine both Qt Quick and QML with the Qt Wayland Compositor to create impressive, imaginative UIs. For more information, see Qt Wayland Compositor.
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland合成器是用于构建自己的合成器的API。它使您可以完全自由地构建自定义的合成器UI并管理各种客户端的窗口。您可以将Qt Quick和QML与Qt Wayland Compositor结合使用，以创建令人印象深刻，富于想象力的UI。有关更多信息，请参见Qt Wayland Compositor。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor recognizes the following environment variables and command-line arguments:
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland Compositor 识别以下环境变量和命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: The Qt WebEngine module provides web developer tools that make it easy to inspect and debug layout and performance issues of any web content.
trans-unit.target: Qt WebEngine模块提供了web开发者工具,使其可以轻松检查和调试任何web内容的布局和性能问题。

trans-unit.source: The Qt WebSockets module provides C++ and QML interfaces that enable Qt applications to act as a server that can process WebSocket requests, or a client that can consume data received from the server, or both.
trans-unit.target: Qt WebSockets模块提供了C++和QML接口,使Qt应用程序能够充当可以处理WebSocket请求的服务器,或可以消费从服务器接收的数据的客户端,或两者兼而有之。

trans-unit.source: The Qt build system uses the tool llvm-config to discover the location of LLVM on your system, and relies on the path to llvm-config being in the PATH environment variable to do so. llvm-config is commonly installed with LLVM and Clang on Linux systems, and also on macOS if LLVM is installed using Brew.
trans-unit.target: Qt构建系统使用工具 llvm-config 来发现LLVM在系统上的位置，并依靠 PATH 环境变量中llvm-config的路径来执行此操作。 llvm-config 通常与LLVM和Clang一起安装在Linux系统上，如果LLVM是使用Brew安装的，则也通常安装在macOS上。

trans-unit.source: The Qt implementation of these macros prints to the stderr output under Unix/X11 and macOS. With Windows, if it is a console application, the text is sent to console; otherwise, it is sent to the debugger.

trans-unit.source: The Qt installation package comes with OpenSSL support but the OpenSSL libraries are not part of the package due to legal restrictions in some countries. If your application depends on OpenSSL, consider packaging the SSL libraries with your Application Package (APK) as the target device may or may not have them.
trans-unit.target: Qt安装包中包含了OpenSSL支持,但由于某些国家的法律限制,OpenSSL库不是安装包的一部分。如果你的应用程序依赖于OpenSSL,请考虑将SSL库与你的应用程序包(APK)一起打包,因为目标设备可能有也可能没有。

trans-unit.source: The Qt installation package comes with OpenSSL support but the OpenSSL libraries are not part of the package due to legal restrictions in some countries. If your application depends on OpenSSL, consider packaging the SSL libraries with your Application Package (APK) as the target device may or may not have them. You can use the QSslSocket::supportsSsl() static function to check for SSL support on the target.
trans-unit.target: Qt安装软件包带有OpenSSL支持，但是由于某些国家/地区的法律限制，OpenSSL库不属于软件包的一部分。如果您的应用程序依赖于OpenSSL，请考虑将SSL库与应用程序包（APK）打包在一起，因为目标设备可能有也可能没有。您可以使用QSslSocket :: supportsSsl（）静态函数来检查目标服务器上的SSL支持。

trans-unit.source: The Qt installers for Linux assume that a C++ compiler, debugger, make, and other development tools are provided by the host operating system. In addition, building graphical Qt applications requires OpenGL libraries and headers installed. Most Linux distributions do not install all of these by default, but setting up a development environment is still straightforward.
trans-unit.target: Linux的Qt安装程序假定主机操作系统提供了C++编译器、调试器、make和其他开发工具。此外,构建图形化的Qt应用程序需要安装OpenGL库和头文件。大多数Linux发行版默认不安装所有这些,但设置开发环境还是很简单的。

trans-unit.source: The Qt layout system provides a simple and powerful way of automatically arranging child widgets within a widget to ensure that they make good use of the available space.
trans-unit.target: Qt布局系统提供了一种简单而强大的方式来自动安排一个widget中的子widget,以确保它们能很好地利用可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The Qt layout system provides a simple and powerful way of specifying the layout of child widgets.
trans-unit.target: Qt布局系统提供了一种简单而强大的方式来指定子部件的布局。

trans-unit.source: The Qt library contains hundreds of internal checks that will print warning messages when a programming error is detected. We therefore recommend that you use a debug version of Qt when developing Qt-based software.
trans-unit.target: Qt库中包含数百个内部检查,当检测到编程错误时,会打印出警告信息。因此,我们建议你在开发基于Qt的软件时,使用Qt的调试版本。

trans-unit.source: The Qt library provides a set of general purpose template-based container classes. These classes can be used to store items of a specified type. For example, if you need a resizable array of QStrings, use QList<QString>.
trans-unit.target: Qt库提供了一组基于通用模板的容器类。这些类可用于存储指定类型的项目。例如，如果您需要一个可调整大小的QString数组，请使用QList < QString >。

trans-unit.source: The Qt library provides a set of general purpose template-based container classes. These classes can be used to store items of a specified type. For example, if you need a resizable array of QStrings, use QVector<QString>.

trans-unit.source: The Qt port was originally written for WinRT and updated to support UWP. The port uses the C++ capabilities. While UWP supports the component extensions internally, they are not used inside Qt and you do not need to use them. UWP applications run in a sandboxed environment for security reasons and support different architectures, such as ARM and x86.
trans-unit.target: Qt port最初是为WinRT编写的,后来更新为支持UWP。该端口使用了C++的功能。虽然UWP内部支持组件扩展,但在Qt内部并没有使用,你不需要使用它们。出于安全考虑,UWP应用在沙盒环境下运行,支持不同的架构,如ARM和x86。

trans-unit.source: The Qt resource system is a platform-independent mechanism for storing binary files in the application's executable. This is useful if your application always needs a certain set of files (icons, translation files, etc.) and you don't want to run the risk of losing the files.
trans-unit.target: Qt资源系统是一种独立于平台的机制,用于在应用程序的可执行文件中存储二进制文件。如果你的应用程序总是需要一组特定的文件(图标、翻译文件等),而你又不想冒着丢失文件的风险,那么这个机制就很有用。

trans-unit.target: Qt源程序包包括第三方库。要设置的Qt是否应该使用图书馆的系统版本或使用捆绑的版本，通过其中-系统或-qt库配置的名称之前。

trans-unit.source: The QtConcurrent::filter(), QtConcurrent::filtered() and QtConcurrent::filteredReduced() functions filter items in a sequence such as a QList in parallel. QtConcurrent::filter() modifies a sequence in-place, QtConcurrent::filtered() returns a new sequence containing the filtered content, and QtConcurrent::filteredReduced() returns a single result.
trans-unit.target: QtConcurrent :: filter（），QtConcurrent :: filtered（）和QtConcurrent :: filteredReduced（）函数以并行方式（例如QList）过滤项目。QtConcurrent :: filter（）修改就地序列，QtConcurrent :: filtered（）返回包含过滤内容的新序列，而QtConcurrent :: filteredReduced（）返回单个结果。

trans-unit.source: The QtConcurrent::filter(), QtConcurrent::filtered() and QtConcurrent::filteredReduced() functions filter items in a sequence such as a QList or a QVector in parallel. QtConcurrent::filter() modifies a sequence in-place, QtConcurrent::filtered() returns a new sequence containing the filtered content, and QtConcurrent::filteredReduced() returns a single result.
trans-unit.target: QtConcurrent :: filter（），QtConcurrent :: filtered（）和QtConcurrent :: filteredReduced（）函数可按顺序过滤诸如QList或QVector之类的项。QtConcurrent :: filter（）修改一个序列，QtConcurrent :: filtered（）返回一个包含过滤内容的新序列，而QtConcurrent :: filteredReduced（）返回一个结果。

trans-unit.source: The QtConcurrent::map(), QtConcurrent::mapped() and QtConcurrent::mappedReduced() functions run computations in parallel on the items in a sequence such as a QList or a QVector. QtConcurrent::map() modifies a sequence in-place, QtConcurrent::mapped() returns a new sequence containing the modified content, and QtConcurrent::mappedReduced() returns a single result.
trans-unit.target: QtConcurrent :: map（），QtConcurrent :: mapped（）和QtConcurrent :: mappedReduced（）函数对诸如QList或QVector之类的项目并行运行计算。QtConcurrent :: map（）修改一个序列，QtConcurrent :: mapped（）返回一个包含修改内容的新序列，而QtConcurrent :: mappedReduced（）返回单个结果。

trans-unit.source: The QtConcurrent::map(), QtConcurrent::mapped() and QtConcurrent::mappedReduced() functions run computations in parallel on the items in a sequence such as a QList. QtConcurrent::map() modifies a sequence in-place, QtConcurrent::mapped() returns a new sequence containing the modified content, and QtConcurrent::mappedReduced() returns a single result.
trans-unit.target: QtConcurrent :: map（），QtConcurrent :: mapped（）和QtConcurrent :: mappedReduced（）函数在诸如QList之类的序列中对项目并行运行计算。QtConcurrent :: map（）修改一个序列，QtConcurrent :: mapped（）返回包含修改内容的新序列，而QtConcurrent :: mappedReduced（）返回单个结果。

trans-unit.source: The QtConcurrent::run() function runs a function in a separate thread. The return value of the function is made available through the QFuture API.
trans-unit.target: QtConcurrent :: run（）函数在单独的线程中运行一个函数。该函数的返回值可通过QFuture API获得。

trans-unit.source: The RGB model is hardware-oriented. Its representation is close to what most monitors show. In contrast, HSV represents color in a way more suited to the human perception of color. For example, the relationships "stronger than", "darker than", and "the opposite of" are easily expressed in HSV but are much harder to express in RGB.
trans-unit.target: RGB模型是面向硬件的。它的表示方式接近于大多数显示器的显示方式。相比之下,HSV表示颜色的方式更适合人类对颜色的感知。例如,"强于"、"暗于"、"相反 "等关系在HSV中很容易表达,但在RGB中却很难表达。

trans-unit.source: The RecursiveBlur effect softens the image by blurring it with an algorithm that uses a recursive feedback loop to blur the source multiple times. The effect may give more blurry results than GaussianBlur or FastBlur, but the result is produced asynchronously and takes more time.

trans-unit.source: The Repeater type creates all of its delegate items when the repeater is first created. This can be inefficient if there are a large number of delegate items and not all of the items are required to be visible at the same time. If this is the case, consider using other view types like ListView (which only creates delegate items when they are scrolled into view) or use the Dynamic Object Creation methods to create items as they are required.
trans-unit.target: 首次创建中继器时，Repeater类型将创建其所有委托项目。如果存在大量的委托项目，并且并非所有项目都必须同时可见，则效率可能较低。如果是这种情况，请考虑使用其他视图类型，例如ListView（仅当它们滚动到视图中时才创建委托项），或使用动态对象创建方法根据需要创建项。

trans-unit.source: The Repeater type is used to create a large number of similar items. Like other view types, a Repeater has a model and a delegate: for each entry in the model, the delegate is instantiated in a context seeded with data from the model. A Repeater item is usually enclosed in a positioner type such as Row or Column to visually position the multiple delegate items created by the Repeater.
trans-unit.target: Repeater类型用于创建大量相似项。像其他视图类型一样，Repeater也有一个模型和一个委托：对于模型中的每个条目，该委托都在一个上下文中实例化，该上下文中植入了来自模型的数据。通常将Repeater项目封装在诸如Row或Column之类的定位器类型中，以直观地定位Repeater创建的多个委托项目。

trans-unit.source: The Repeater3D type is used to create a large number of similar items. Like other view types, a Repeater3D has a model and a delegate: for each entry in the model, the delegate is instantiated in a context seeded with data from the model.
trans-unit.target: Repeater3D类型用于创建大量相似的项目。像其他视图类型一样，Repeater3D也具有一个模型和一个委托：对于模型中的每个条目，该委托在从模型数据中植入的上下文中实例化。

trans-unit.source: The ReviewModel is a read-only model used to fetch reviews about a Place. The model incrementally fetches. The number of reviews which are fetched at a time is specified by the batchSize property. The total number of reviews available can be accessed via the totalCount property.
trans-unit.target: ReviewModel是一个只读模型，用于获取有关Place的评论。模型以增量方式获取。一次获取的评论数由batchSize属性指定。可以通过totalCount属性访问可用的评论总数。

trans-unit.source: The Revised Julian calendar, also known as the Milanković calendar, or, less formally, new calendar, is a calendar, developed and proposed by the Serbian scientist Milutin Milanković in 1923, which effectively discontinued the 340 years of divergence between the naming of dates sanctioned by those Eastern Orthodox churches adopting it and the Gregorian calendar that has come to predominate worldwide. This calendar was intended to replace the ecclesiastical calendar based on the Julian calendar hitherto in use by all of the Eastern Orthodox Church. The Revised Julian calendar temporarily aligned its dates with the Gregorian calendar proclaimed in 1582 by Pope Gregory XIII for adoption by the Christian world. The calendar has been adopted by the Orthodox churches of Constantinople, Albania, Alexandria, Antioch, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Greece, Poland, and Romania.
trans-unit.target: 修订后的朱利安历,又称Milanković历法,或不太正式的新历法,是塞尔维亚科学家Milutin Milanković于1923年制定和提出的历法,它有效地终止了采用该历法的东正教教会认可的日期命名与已在全世界占主导地位的格里高利历法之间长达340年的差异。该历法旨在取代所有东正教会迄今使用的基于朱利安历的教会历法。修订后的朱利安历暂时将其日期与1582年教皇格雷戈里十三世宣布的格里高利历相一致,供基督教世界采用。君士坦丁堡、阿尔巴尼亚、亚历山大、安提阿、保加利亚、塞浦路斯、希腊、波兰和罗马尼亚的东正教教会都采用了这一日历。

trans-unit.source: The SOCKS5 support since Qt 4 is based on RFC 1928 and RFC 1929. The supported authentication methods are no authentication and username/password authentication. Both IPv4 and IPv6 are supported. Domain names are resolved through the SOCKS5 server if the QNetworkProxy::HostNameLookupCapability is enabled, otherwise they are resolved locally and the IP address is sent to the server. There are several things to remember when using SOCKS5 with QUdpSocket and QTcpServer:
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4开始，SOCKS5支持基于RFC 1928和RFC 1929。支持的身份验证方法为无身份验证和用户名/密码身份验证。IPv4和IPv6均受支持。如果启用了QNetworkProxy :: HostNameLookupCapability，则通过SOCKS5服务器解析域名，否则，将在本地解析域名并将IP地址发送到服务器。将SOCKS5与QUdpSocket和QTcpServer一起使用时，要记住几件事：

trans-unit.source: The Scene3D type renders a Qt3D scene, provided by an Entity, into a multisampled Framebuffer object. This object is later blitted into a non-multisampled Framebuffer object, which is then rendered with premultiplied alpha. If multisampling is not required, it can be avoided by setting the multisample property to false. In this case Scene3D will render directly into the non-multisampled Framebuffer object.
trans-unit.target: Scene3D类型将由Entity提供的Qt3D场景渲染到多重采样的Framebuffer对象中。此对象随后被渗入非多重采样的帧缓冲区对象，然后使用预乘的alpha渲染该对象。如果不需要多重采样，可以通过将multisample属性设置为 false 来避免这种情况。在这种情况下，Scene3D将直接渲染到非多重采样的Framebuffer对象中。

trans-unit.source: The ShaderEffectSource type does not redirect any mouse or keyboard input to sourceItem. trans-unit.source: The ShaderEffectSource type renders sourceItem into a texture and displays it in the scene. sourceItem is drawn into the texture as though it was a fully opaque root item. Thus sourceItem itself can be invisible, but still appear in the texture.

trans-unit.source: The Software adaptation is an alternative renderer for Qt Quick 2 that uses the Raster paint engine to render the contents of the scene graph, instead of OpenGL. Consequently, some features and optimizations are not available. Most Qt Quick 2 applications can run without any modification, but any attempts to use unsupported features are ignored. By using the Software adaptation, it is possible to run Qt Quick 2 applications on hardware and platforms that do not have OpenGL support.
trans-unit.target: 该软件改编版是Qt Quick 2的替代渲染器，它使用Raster绘制引擎而不是OpenGL渲染场景图的内容。因此，某些功能和优化不可用。大多数Qt Quick 2应用程序都可以运行而无需进行任何修改，但是任何使用不受支持的功能的尝试都将被忽略。通过使用软件改编，可以在不支持OpenGL的硬件和平台上运行Qt Quick 2应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The Software adaptation is an alternative renderer for Qt Quick 2 that uses the raster paint engine to render the contents of the scene graph. For more details, see Software Adaptation.

trans-unit.source: The Software adaptation is an alternative renderer for Qt Quick 2 that uses the Raster paint engine to render the contents of the scene graph, instead of OpenGL. Consequently, some features and optimizations are not available. Most Qt Quick 2 applications can run without any modification, but any attempts to use unsupported features are ignored. By using the Software adaptation, it is possible to run Qt Quick 2 applications on hardware and platforms that do not have OpenGL support.
trans-unit.target: 该软件改编版是Qt Quick 2 的替代渲染器，它使用Raster绘制引擎而不是OpenGL渲染场景图的内容。因此，某些功能和优化不可用。大多数Qt Quick 2应用程序都可以运行，而无需进行任何修改，但是任何使用不受支持的功能的尝试都将被忽略。通过使用软件改编，可以在不支持OpenGL的硬件和平台上运行Qt Quick 2应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The Software adaptation was previously known as the Qt Quick 2D Renderer. However, unlike the 2D Renderer, this new, integrated version supports partial updates. This means that a full update of the window or screen contents is now avoided; only the changed areas are flushed. Partial updates can significantly improve performance for many applications.
trans-unit.target: 该软件适配版之前被称为Qt Quick 2D Renderer。然而,与2D渲染器不同,这个新的集成版本支持部分更新。这意味着现在避免了对窗口或屏幕内容的全面更新,只对改变的区域进行刷新。部分更新可以显著提高许多应用程序的性能。

trans-unit.source: The Solar Hijri calendar (also called Persian).
trans-unit.target: 太阳节历(又称波斯历)。

trans-unit.source: The Solar Hijri calendar produces a five-year leap year interval after about every seven four-year leap year intervals. It usually follows a 33-year cycle with occasional interruptions by single 29-year or 37-year subcycles. The reason for this behavior is that it tracks the observed vernal equinox. By contrast, some less accurate predictive algorithms are in use based on confusion between the average tropical year (365.2422 days, approximated with near 128-year cycles or 2820-year great cycles) and the mean interval between spring equinoxes (365.2424 days, approximated with a near 33-year cycle).
trans-unit.target: 太阳历每隔7个4年闰年就产生一个5年闰年。它通常遵循33年的周期,偶尔会有29年或37年的子周期中断。这种行为的原因是它跟踪观察到的春分点。与此相反,一些不太准确的预测算法是基于对平均热带年(365.2422天,近似于128年周期或2820年大周期)和春分平均间隔(365.2424天,近似于33年周期)的混淆而使用的。

trans-unit.source: The Solar Hijri calendar, also called the Solar Hejri calendar, Shamsi Hijri calendar or Jalali calendar, is the official calendar of Iran and Afghanistan. It begins on the vernal equinox (Nowruz) as determined by astronomical calculation for the Iran Standard Time meridian (52.5°E or GMT+3.5h). This determination of starting moment is more accurate than the Gregorian calendar for predicting the date of the vernal equinox, because it uses astronomical observations rather than mathematical rules.
trans-unit.target: 太阳回历日历，也称为太阳回历日历，Shamsi Hijri日历或Jalali日历，是伊朗和阿富汗的官方日历。它开始于经伊朗标准时间子午线（52.5°E或GMT + 3.5h）的天文计算所确定的春分点（Nowruz）。这种确定起始时刻的方法比使用公历日期的公历更为准确，因为它使用的是天文观测而非数学规则。

trans-unit.source: The State Machine Framework
trans-unit.target: 状态机框架

trans-unit.source: The State Machine framework provides an API and execution model that can be used to effectively embed the elements and semantics of statecharts in Qt applications. The framework integrates tightly with Qt's meta-object system; for example, transitions between states can be triggered by signals, and states can be configured to set properties and invoke methods on {QObject}s. Qt's event system is used to drive the state machines.
trans-unit.target: 状态机框架提供了API和执行模型，可用于将状态图的元素和语义有效地嵌入Qt应用程序中。该框架与Qt的元对象系统紧密集成。例如，状态之间的转换可以由信号触发，状态可以配置为设置属性并调用{ QObject }上的方法。Qt的事件系统用于驱动状态机。

trans-unit.source: The State Machine framework provides classes for creating and executing state graphs. The concepts and notation are based on those from Harel's Statecharts: A visual formalism for complex systems, which is also the basis of UML state diagrams. The semantics of state machine execution are based on State Chart XML (SCXML).
trans-unit.target: 状态机框架提供了用于创建和执行状态图的类。概念和表示法基于Harel的Statecharts：复杂系统的可视化形式主义，也是UML状态图的基础。状态机执行的语义基于状态图XML（SCXML）。

trans-unit.source: The Surface of the parent WaylandQuickItem will be drawn in a hardware specific way instead of the regular way using the QtQuick scene graph. On some platforms, the WaylandQuickItem's current buffer and the scene graph can be blended in a separate step. This makes it possible for clients to update continuously without triggering a full redraw of the compositor scene graph for each frame.
trans-unit.target: 父WaylandQuickItem的Surface 将以硬件特定方式绘制，而不是使用QtQuick场景图以常规方式绘制。在某些平台上，可以在单独的步骤中混合WaylandQuickItem的当前缓冲区和场景图。这样，客户端就可以连续更新而无需触发每个帧的合成器场景图的完全重绘。

trans-unit.source: The Surface of the parent WaylandQuickItem will be drawn in a hardware specific way instead of the regular way using the QtQuick scene graph. trans-unit.source: The TaskbarButton type enables you to set an overlay icon and to display a progress indicator on a taskbar button. An overlay icon indicates change in the state of the application. A progress indicator shows how time-consuming tasks are progressing.

trans-unit.source: The Temperature Measurement characteristic is a variable length structure containing a Flags field, a Temperature Measurement Value field and, based upon the contents of the Flags field, optionally a Time Stamp field and/or a Temperature Type field.
trans-unit.target: 温度测量特性是一个可变长度的结构,包含一个标志字段、一个温度测量值字段,根据标志字段的内容,还可以选择一个时间戳字段和/或温度类型字段。

trans-unit.source: The Temperature Type characteristic is an enumeration that indicates where the temperature was measured.
trans-unit.target: 温度类型特性是一个列举,表示测量温度的位置。

trans-unit.source: The Temporal and Progressive antialiasing steps are optionally enabled by setting properties in the SceneEnvironment. While not strictly a part of the post processing phase, the actual results of Temporal and Progressive antialiasing are realized during the post processing phase.
trans-unit.target: 通过在SceneEnvironment中设置属性，可以选择性地启用“时间”和“渐进式”抗锯齿步骤。虽然不是严格地属于后期处理阶段的一部分，但临时和渐进式抗锯齿的实际结果是在后期处理阶段实现的。

trans-unit.source: The Text2DEntity renders text as triangles in the XY plane. The geometry will be fitted in the rectangle of specified width and height. If the resulting geometry is wider than the specified width, the remainder will be rendered on the new line.
trans-unit.target: Text2DEntity在XY平面上将文字渲染成三角形。几何图形将被安装在指定宽度和高度的矩形中。如果生成的几何体比指定的宽度宽,剩余的部分将在新的线条上呈现。

trans-unit.source: The Texture type in Qt Quick 3D represents a two-dimensional image. Its use is typically to map onto / wrap around three-dimensional geometry to emulate additional detail which cannot be efficiently modelled in 3D. It can also be used to emulate other lighting effects, such as reflections.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick 3D中的Texture类型代表了一个二维图像。它的用途通常是映射到/环绕三维几何体,以模拟无法在三维中有效建模的额外细节。它也可以用来模拟其他的光照效果,如反射。

trans-unit.source: The TiltShift effect simulates depth of field in a simple and performant manner. Instead of blurring based on the depth buffer, it blurs everything except for a horizontal or vertical stripe on the layer.

trans-unit.source: The Transform component is not shareable between multiple Entity's. The transformation is held as vector3d scale, quaternion rotation and vector3d translation components. The transformations are applied to the mesh in that order. When Transform::matrix property is set, it is decomposed to these transform components and corresponding transform signals are emitted.
trans-unit.target: 变换组件不可在多个实体之间共享。变换保持为vector3d比例，四元数旋转和vector3d平移分量。转换将以该顺序应用于网格。当变换矩阵::属性设置，它被分解成这些变换分量和相应的变换的信号被发射。

trans-unit.source: The Transform type is a base type which cannot be instantiated directly. The following concrete Transform types are available:
trans-unit.target: Transform类型是一个基础类型,不能直接实例化。以下是具体的Transform类型。

trans-unit.source: The UIComponents example demonstrates proper usage of QDoc commands to document QML types and QML modules.
trans-unit.target: UIComponents示例演示了QDoc命令的正确使用,以记录QML类型和QML模块。

trans-unit.source: The URI resolver provides a level of abstraction, or
trans-unit.target: URI解析器提供了一个抽象的层次,或称

trans-unit.source: The URIs used for features and properties often look like URLs, e.g. http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace. This does not mean that the data required is at this address. It is simply a way of defining unique names.
trans-unit.target: 用于功能和属性的URI通常看起来像URL，例如 http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace 。这并不意味着所需的数据位于此地址。这只是定义唯一名称的一种方式。

trans-unit.source: The URL being intercepted is a url property in a QML file, and not being used to load a file through the engine.
trans-unit.target: 被拦截的URL是QML文件中的一个url属性,而不是通过引擎来加载文件。

trans-unit.source: The URL being intercepted is an import for a Javascript file.
trans-unit.target: 被拦截的URL是一个Javascript文件的导入。

trans-unit.source: The URL being intercepted is for a Qml file. Intercepting this, but not the Qmldir file, leaves the base dir of a QML file untouched and acts like replacing the file with another file.
trans-unit.target: 被拦截的URL是一个Qml文件。拦截这个文件,但不拦截Qmldir文件,会使QML文件的基目录不受影响,就像用另一个文件替换该文件一样。

trans-unit.source: The URL being intercepted is for a Qmldir file. Intercepting this, but not the QmlFile, allows for swapping out entire sub trees.
trans-unit.target: 被拦截的URL是一个Qmldir文件。拦截这个,但不拦截QmlFile,就可以交换整个子树。

trans-unit.source: The URL does not represent a valid file or location to read it from, it is primarily a key to access images through Qt Quick's image-based types.
trans-unit.target: URL并不代表读取它的有效文件或位置,它主要是通过Qt Quick的图像类型来访问图像的一个键。

trans-unit.source: The URL is run through a conformance test. Every part of the URL must conform to the standard encoding rules of the URI standard for the URL to be reported as valid.
trans-unit.target: URL将通过一致性测试来运行。URL的每一个部分都必须符合URI标准的标准编码规则,URL才能被报告为有效。

trans-unit.source: The URL is stored in the generated index file for the project. QDoc will use this as the base URL when constructing external links to content listed in the index.
trans-unit.target: 该URL存储在项目生成的索引文件中,QDoc将以此为基础URL,构建指向索引中所列内容的外部链接。QDoc在构建指向索引中列出的内容的外部链接时,会将其作为基础URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL is stored in the generated index file for the project. When we use the index on its own, QDoc will use this as the base URL when constructing links to classes, functions, and other things listed in the index.
trans-unit.target: 这个URL存储在项目生成的索引文件中。当我们单独使用索引的时候,QDoc在构建索引中列出的类、函数和其他东西的链接时,会将其作为基础URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL is used as-is. URLs that originate from user input should be parsed with QUrl::fromUserInput().
trans-unit.target: 该URL照原样使用。源自用户输入的URL应该使用QUrl :: fromUserInput（）进行解析。

trans-unit.source: The URL is valid until the QQuickItemGrabResult object is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 该URL在删除QQuickItemGrabResult对象之前一直有效。

trans-unit.source: The URL is valid while there is a reference in QML or JavaScript to the ItemGrabResult or while the image the URL references is actively used.
trans-unit.target: 在QML或JavaScript中有对ItemGrabResult的引用时，或在有效使用URL引用的图像时，该URL有效。

trans-unit.source: The URL may be absolute, or relative to the URL of the component.
trans-unit.target: URL可以是绝对的,也可以是相对于组件的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of a large cover art image.
trans-unit.target: 大型封面艺术图片的网址。

trans-unit.target: 海报图片的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of a small cover art image.
trans-unit.target: 小封面艺术图片的网址。

trans-unit.source: The URL of currently loaded web page. Changing this will trigger loading new content.
trans-unit.target: 当前加载的网页的URL。改变这个会触发加载新内容。

trans-unit.source: The URL of media if the selected web content is a media element.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择的网页内容是媒体元素,则是媒体的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the HTTP request for which authentication was requested. In case of proxy authentication, this is a request URL which is proxied via host.
trans-unit.target: 请求认证的HTTP请求的URL。在代理认证的情况下,是通过主机代理的请求URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the SCXML document to load. Only synchronously accessible URLs are supported.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the font to load.
trans-unit.target: 要加载的字体的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image.
trans-unit.target: 图片的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the link if the selected web page content is a link. It is not guaranteed to be a valid URL.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择的网页内容是一个链接,则链接的URL。它不保证是一个有效的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the load request.
trans-unit.target: 加载请求的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the page sending the notification.
trans-unit.target: 发送通知的页面的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the security origin.
trans-unit.target: 安全来源的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the web page that issued the fullscreen request.
trans-unit.target: 发出全屏请求的网页的URL。

trans-unit.target: 发出配额请求的网页的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the web page to go to.

trans-unit.source: The Universal style is a device-agnostic style based on the Microsoft Universal Design Guidelines. The Universal style has been designed to look good on all devices, from phones and tablets to PCs.

trans-unit.source: The Universal style must be separately imported to gain access to the attributes that are specific to the Universal style. It should be noted that regardless of the references to the Universal style, the same application code runs with any other style. Universal-specific attributes only have an effect when the application is run with the Universal style.
trans-unit.target: 通用样式必须单独导入,才能访问通用样式特有的属性。应该注意的是,无论对Universal风格的引用如何,同样的应用程序代码可以用任何其他风格运行。只有当应用程序用Universal风格运行时,Universal特定的属性才有效果。

trans-unit.source: The VBarModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A vertical model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and QAbstractBarSeries, so that each column in the data model defines a bar set and each row maps to a category in a bar series. You need to implement the data model and expose it to QML.
trans-unit.target: VBarModelMapper类型允许使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。垂直模型映射器用于在数据模型和QAbstractBarSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一列都定义一个条形集，并且每一行都映射到一个条形系列中的类别。您需要实现数据模型并将其公开给QML。

trans-unit.source: The VBoxPlotModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A vertical model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and a BoxPlotSeries type, so that each column in the data model defines a box-and-whiskers item and each row maps to the range and three median values of the box-and-whiskers item.
trans-unit.target: VBoxPlotModelMapper类型允许使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。垂直模型映射器用于在数据模型和BoxPlotSeries类型之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一列都定义一个盒须项目，并且每一行都映射到该盒的范围和三个中值。和胡须项目。

trans-unit.source: The VideoOutput item supports untransformed, stretched, and uniformly scaled video presentation. For a description of stretched uniformly scaled presentation, see the fillMode property description.
trans-unit.target: VideoOutput项支持未转换，拉伸和均匀缩放的视频演示。有关拉伸的均匀缩放演示文稿的描述，请参见fillMode属性描述。

trans-unit.source: The VideoOutput item works with backends that support either QVideoRendererControl or QVideoWindowControl. If the backend only supports QVideoWindowControl, the video is rendered onto an overlay window that is layered on top of the QtQuick window. Due to the nature of the video overlays, certain features are not available for these kind of backends:

trans-unit.source: The ViewTransition attached property provides the following properties specific to the item to which the transition is applied:

trans-unit.source: The ViewTransition.targetIndexes and ViewTransition.targetItems lists provide the items and indexes of all delegate instances that are the targets of the relevant operation. For an add operation, these are all the items that are added into the view; for a remove, these are all the items removed from the view, and so on. (Note these lists will only contain references to items that have been created within the view or its cached items; targets that are not within the visible area of the view or within the item cache will not be accessible.)
trans-unit.target: ViewTransition。targetIndexes和ViewTransition。targetItems列表提供作为相关操作目标的所有委托实例的项目和索引。对于添加操作，这些是添加到视图中的所有项目。对于删除，这些是从视图中删除的所有项目，依此类推。（请注意，这些列表仅包含对在视图内创建的项目或其缓存的项目的引用；不在视图的可见区域内或项目缓存内的目标将不可访问。）

trans-unit.source: The ViewTransition.item property gives a reference to the item to which the transition is being applied. This can be used to access any of the item's attributes, custom property values, and so on.
trans-unit.target: ViewTransition.item属性提供对要应用过渡的项目的引用。这可用于访问项目的任何属性，自定义 property 值等。

trans-unit.source: The WMF plugin in Qt does not currently provide a camera backend. Instead, limited support for camera features is provided by the DirectShow plugin. trans-unit.source: The WaylandOutput manages a rectangular area within bounds of the compositor's geometry, to use it for displaying client content. This could, for instance, be a screen managed by the WaylandCompositor.
trans-unit.target: WaylandOutput管理合成器几何形状范围内的矩形区域，以将其用于显示客户端内容。例如，这可能是WaylandCompositor管理的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The WaylandSeat type provides access to different types of user input and maintains a keyboard focus and a mouse pointer. It corresponds to the wl_seat interface in the Wayland protocol.
trans-unit.target: WaylandSeat类型提供对不同类型的用户输入的访问,并保持键盘焦点和鼠标指针。它对应于Wayland协议中的wl_seat接口。

trans-unit.source: The WaylandView corresponds to the presentation of a surface on a specific output, managing the buffers that contain the contents to be rendered. You can have several views into the same surface.
trans-unit.target: WaylandView对应于在特定输出上呈现一个曲面,管理包含要渲染的内容的缓冲区。您可以在同一个曲面中拥有多个视图。

trans-unit.source: The WebEngineSettings type can be used to configure browser properties and generic attributes, such as JavaScript support, focus behavior, and access to remote content. This type is uncreatable, but the default settings for all web engine views can be accessed by using the WebEngine.settings property.
trans-unit.target: WebEngineSettings类型可用于配置浏览器属性和通用属性，例如JavaScript支持，焦点行为以及对远程内容的访问。此类型是不可创建的，但是可以使用WebEngine.settings属性访问所有Web引擎视图的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The WebEngineView type enables QML applications to render regions of dynamic web content. It may share the screen with other QML types, such as a TabView, or fill the screen, as specified within the QML application.
trans-unit.target: WebEngineView类型使QML应用程序能够渲染动态网页内容的区域。它可以与其他QML类型共享屏幕,如TabView,或者按照QML应用程序的规定填充屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The WebSockets specification as outlined in RFC 6455 requires that all communication from client to server be masked. This is to prevent malicious scripts from attacking badly behaving proxies. For more information about the importance of good masking, see "Talking to Yourself for Fun and Profit" by Lin-Shung Huang et al. By default QWebSocket uses the reasonably secure QRandomGenerator::global()->generate() function. The best measure against attacks mentioned in the document above, is to use QWebSocket over a secure connection (
trans-unit.target: RFC 6455中概述的WebSockets规范要求屏蔽从客户端到服务器的所有通信。这是为了防止恶意脚本攻击行为不良的代理。有关良好遮罩的重要性的更多信息，请参见Huang Lin-Shung Huang等人的“与自己交谈以获取乐趣和收益”。默认情况下，QWebSocket使用相当安全的QRandomGenerator :: global（）-> generate（）函数。防止上面文档中提到的攻击的最佳方法是在安全连接上使用QWebSocket（

trans-unit.source: The WildcardConversionOption enum defines modifiers to the way a wildcard glob pattern gets converted to a regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: WildcardConversionOption枚举定义了通配符glob模式转换为正则表达式模式的修改器。

trans-unit.source: The WildcardConversionOptions type is a typedef for QFlags<WildcardConversionOption>. It stores an OR combination of WildcardConversionOption values.
trans-unit.target: WildcardConversionOptions类型是QFlags <WildcardConversionOption>的typedef 。它存储WildcardConversionOption值的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: The Win32 API that both Qt and compiler tools use has a built-in maximum file path length of 260 characters (MAX_PATH). This can hit you in various forms if either your absolute or relative directory structures are too verbose. It is therefore recommended to keep the file system paths within limits, and put build directories nearby the source directories.
trans-unit.target: Qt和编译器工具都使用的Win32 API的内置最大文件路径长度为260个字符（ MAX_PATH ）。如果您的绝对目录结构或相对目录结构太冗长，则可能会以各种形式打击您。因此，建议将文件系统路径保持在限制范围内，并在源目录附近放置构建目录。

trans-unit.source: The WinRT Runner Tool can be found in QTDIR/bin/winrtrunner. It is intended to aid in the deployment, launching, and debugging of Qt for WinRT applications. It can be used from the command line, or invoked by the IDE.
trans-unit.target: WinRT Runner工具可以在QTDIR/bin/winrtrunner中找到。它的目的是帮助部署、启动和调试Qt for WinRT应用程序。它可以从命令行使用,或由IDE调用。

trans-unit.source: The Window object creates a new top-level window for a Qt Quick scene. It automatically sets up the window for use with QtQuick 2.x graphical types.
trans-unit.target: Window对象为Qt Quick场景创建一个新的顶层窗口。它会自动设置与 QtQuick 2.x 图形类型一起使用的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The WindowFlags type is a typedef for QFlags<WindowType>. It stores an OR combination of WindowType values.
trans-unit.target: WindowFlags类型是QFlags <WindowType> 的typedef 。它存储WindowType值的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: The WindowStates type is a typedef for QFlags<WindowState>. It stores an OR combination of WindowState values.
trans-unit.target: WindowStates类型是QFlags <WindowState> 的typedef 。它存储WindowState值的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: The Windows Plug-n-Play service automatically installs the necessary drivers when the gamepad is connected through a USB port for the first time. Once the drivers are installed, select Control Panel > Device and Printers and check if the gamepad is listed under the Devices section.
trans-unit.target: 第一次通过USB端口连接游戏板时，Windows Plug-n-Play服务会自动安装必要的驱动程序。安装驱动程序后，选择控制面板>设备和打印机，然后检查游戏手柄是否在设备部分下列出。

trans-unit.source: The Windows Store provides a way to set an application into trial mode and buy the application itself via in-app purchases. To reflect this functionality, the WinRT backend uses the app keyword as an identifier. If a product query for app succeeds, the current license is valid. The product name itself will provide information on the license state of the app and can have the following content:

To reflect this functionality, the WinRT backend uses the app keyword as an identifier. If a product query for app succeeds, the current license is valid. The product name itself will provide information on the license state of the app and can have the following content:

trans-unit.source: The Windows system registry has the following limitations: A subkey may not exceed 255 characters, an entry's value may not exceed 16,383 characters, and all the values of a key may not exceed 65,535 characters. One way to work around these limitations is to store the settings using the IniFormat instead of the NativeFormat.
trans-unit.target: Windows系统注册表具有以下限制：子项不能超过255个字符，条目的值不能超过16,383个字符，并且键的所有值都不能超过65,535个字符。要解决这些限制的一种方法是使用存储的设置IniFormat而不是NativeFormat。

trans-unit.target: WizardOptions类型是QFlags <WizardOption> 的typedef 。它存储WizardOption值的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: The WlScaler extension provides a way for clients to resize and crop surface contents.
trans-unit.target: WlScaler扩展为客户提供了一种调整大小和裁剪表面内容的方法。

trans-unit.target: WmWindowTypes类型是QFlags <WmWindowType> 的typedef 。它存储WmWindowType值的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: The X, Y and Z flags allow an app to check for taps along an axis without caring about the direction.
trans-unit.target: X、Y和Z标志允许应用程序检查沿轴的点击,而无需关心方向。

trans-unit.source: The X11 Window System has the concept of a separate selection and clipboard. When text is selected, it is immediately available as the global mouse selection. The global mouse selection may later be copied to the clipboard. By convention, the middle mouse button is used to paste the global mouse selection.
trans-unit.target: X11窗口系统有单独的选择和剪贴板的概念。当文本被选中时,它将立即作为全局鼠标选择。全局鼠标选区以后可以复制到剪贴板。按照惯例,鼠标中键是用来粘贴全局鼠标选择的。

trans-unit.source: The XAnimator type animates the x position of an Item. More...
trans-unit.target: XAnimator类型可为Item的x位置设置动画。更多的...

trans-unit.source: The XML declaration that appears at the top of an XML document, typically <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>, is treated by QDom as a processing instruction. This is unfortunate, since the XML declaration is not a processing instruction; among other differences, it cannot be inserted into a document anywhere but on the first line.
trans-unit.target: QDom将出现在XML文档顶部的XML声明（通常为 <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> 1.0'encoding ='UTF-8'？>）作为处理指令。不幸的是，因为XML声明不是处理指令；因此，请参见。除其他差异外，无法将其插入文档中的第一行。

trans-unit.source: The XML handler classes with information about the parsing position within a file
trans-unit.target: 具有文件内解析位置信息的XML处理程序类。

trans-unit.source: The XML reader must be told which handler to use for different kinds of events during parsing. This means that, although QXmlDefaultHandler provides default implementations of functions inherited from all its base classes, we can still use specialized handlers for particular kinds of events.
trans-unit.target: 必须告知XML阅读器在解析期间对不同类型的事件使用哪个处理程序。这意味着，尽管QXmlDefaultHandler提供了从其所有基类继承的函数的默认实现，但对于特定类型的事件，我们仍然可以使用专门的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The XML reader must be told which handler to use for different kinds of events during parsing. This means that, although QXmlDefaultHandler provides default implementations of functions inherited from all its base classes, we can still use specialized handlers for particular kinds of events.
trans-unit.target: XML 阅读器必须被告知在解析过程中对不同类型的事件使用哪个处理程序。这意味着,尽管QXmlDefaultHandler提供了从所有基类中继承的函数的默认实现,我们仍然可以为特定类型的事件使用专门的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The XML subsystem constructs an instance of this class when it detects an error. You can retrieve the place where the error occurred using systemId(), publicId(), lineNumber() and columnNumber(), along with the error message(). The possible error messages are:

trans-unit.source: The XPath language is a subset of the XQuery language, so running an XPath expression is the same as running an XQuery query. Pass the XPath expression to QXmlQuery using setQuery().
trans-unit.target: XPath语言是XQuery语言的子集，因此运行XPath表达式与运行XQuery查询相同。使用setQuery（）将XPath表达式传递给QXmlQuery 。

trans-unit.target: XPath语言是XQuery语言的子集，因此运行XPath表达式与运行XQuery查询相同。使用setQuery（）将XPath表达式传递给QXmlQuery。

trans-unit.source: The XQuery Data Model
trans-unit.target: XQuery数据模型

trans-unit.source: The XQuery in myQuery.xq will be evaluated and its output written to stdout. Pass the -help switch to get the list of input flags and their meanings.
trans-unit.target: 将评估 myQuery.xq 中的XQuery 并将其输出写入 stdout 。传递 -help 开关以获取输入标志及其含义的列表。

trans-unit.source: The XQuery/XPath language simplifies data searching and transformation tasks by eliminating the need for doing a lot of C++ or Java procedural programming for each new query task. Here is an XQuery that constructs a bibliography of the contents of a library:
trans-unit.target: XQuery/XPath语言简化了数据搜索和转换任务,无需为每个新的查询任务进行大量的C++或Java程序化编程。下面是一个XQuery,它可以构造一个图书馆内容的书目。

trans-unit.source: The XYPoint type is a convenience type for initializing line, spline, and scatter series with static coordinate data. To manipulate a series dynamically, use the data manipulation functions it inherits from the XYSeries type, instead.
trans-unit.target: XYPoint类型是一种方便类型，用于使用静态坐标数据初始化线，样条线和散布序列。要动态地处理序列，请改用它从XYSeries类型继承的数据处理函数。

trans-unit.source: The Xcode Active Build Configurations settings are for modifying Xcode configurations, compiler flags and similar build options. Unlike Visual Studio, Xcode does not allow for the selection of specific library files based on whether debug or release build configurations are selected. The qmake debug and release settings control which library files are linked to the executable.
trans-unit.target: Xcode Active Build Configurations设置用于修改Xcode配置、编译器标志和类似的构建选项。与Visual Studio不同的是,Xcode不允许根据选择调试或发布构建配置来选择特定的库文件。qmake调试和发布设置控制哪些库文件被链接到可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: The XdgDecorationManagerV1 extension provides a way for a compositor to announce support for server-side window decorations, and for xdg-shell clients to communicate whether they prefer client-side or server-side decorations.
trans-unit.target: XdgDecorationManagerV1扩展提供了一种方法,让合成器宣布支持服务器端窗口装饰,并让xdg-shell客户端交流他们是喜欢客户端还是服务器端装饰。

trans-unit.source: The XdgOutputManagerV1 extension provides a way for a compositor to describe outputs in a way that is more in line with the concept of an output on desktop oriented systems.
trans-unit.target: XdgOutputManagerV1扩展为合成器提供了一种描述输出的方式,这种方式更符合面向桌面系统的输出概念。

trans-unit.source: The XdgShell extension provides a way to associate a XdgToplevel or XdgPopup with a regular Wayland surface. Using the XdgToplevel interface, the client can request that the surface is resized, moved, and so on.
trans-unit.target: XdgShell扩展提供了一种将XdgToplevel或XdgPopup与常规Wayland曲面关联的方法。使用XdgToplevel接口，客户端可以请求调整表面大小，移动表面等。

trans-unit.source: The XdgShell extension provides a way to associate a XdgToplevel or XdgPopup with a regular Wayland surface. Using the XdgToplevel interface, the client can request that the surface is resized, moved, and so on.
trans-unit.target: XdgShell扩展提供了一种将XdgToplevel或XdgPopup与常规Wayland曲面关联的方法。使用XdgToplevel接口，客户端可以请求调整表面大小，移动表面等。

trans-unit.source: The \\ command expands to a double backslash.
trans-unit.target: 命令扩展为双反斜杠。

trans-unit.source: The \\ command is useful if you want a backslash to appear verbatim, for example, writing C:\windows\home\.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想让反斜杠一字不差地出现,例如,写C:\windows\home,\命令就很有用。

trans-unit.source: The \a command tells QDoc the next word is a formal parameter name.
trans-unit.target: \a命令告诉QDoc下一个词是一个正式的参数名称。

trans-unit.target: annotatedlist命令可以扩展为一个组的成员列表,每个成员都以其名字的形式列出。

trans-unit.source: The \b command renders its argument in bold font. This command used to be called \bold.
trans-unit.target: β命令将其参数以粗体字显示。该命令过去称为"/bold"。

trans-unit.source: The \brief command can be used in two significant different ways: One for classes, namespaces and header files, and one for properties and variables.
trans-unit.target: \ brief命令可以以两种重要的不同方式使用：一种用于类，名称空间和头文件，另一种用于属性和变量。

trans-unit.source: The \brief command can be used in two significant different ways: One for classes, namespaces and header files, and one for properties and variables.
trans-unit.target: \ brief命令可以以两种重要的不同方式使用：一种用于类，名称空间和头文件，另一种用于属性和变量。

trans-unit.source: The \brief command introduces a one-sentence description of a class, namespace, header file, property, or variable.
trans-unit.target: \brief命令介绍了对一个类、命名空间、头文件、属性或变量的一句话描述。

trans-unit.source: The \c command accepts the special character \ within its argument, which renders it as a normal character. So if you want to use nested commands, you must use the teletype (\tt) command instead.
trans-unit.target: \ c命令在其参数中接受特殊字符 \ ，这会将其呈现为普通字符。因此，如果要使用嵌套命令，则必须改用电传（\ tt）命令。

trans-unit.source: The \c command accepts the special character \ within its argument, which renders it as a normal character. So if you want to use nested commands, you must use the teletype (\tt) command instead.
trans-unit.target: \ c命令在其参数中接受特殊字符 \ ，这会将其呈现为普通字符。因此，如果要使用嵌套命令，则必须改用电传（\ tt）命令。

trans-unit.source: The \c command is used for rendering variable names, user-defined class names, and C++ keywords (for example, int and for) in the code font.
trans-unit.target: \ c命令用于以代码字体呈现变量名，用户定义的类名和C ++关键字（例如 int 和 for ）。

trans-unit.source: The \c command is useful if you want a backslash to appear verbatim, and the word that contains it written in a monospace font, like this: C:\windows\home\.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望逐字显示反斜杠，并且包含反斜杠的单词以等宽字体书写，则\ c命令很有用，例如： C:\windows\home\ 。

trans-unit.source: The \caption command provides a caption for an image.
trans-unit.target: \caption命令为图像提供一个标题。

trans-unit.source: The \code and \endcode commands enclose a snippet of source code.
trans-unit.target: 编码和endcode命令包含一段源代码。

trans-unit.source: The \codeline command inserts a blank line of preformatted text. It is used to insert gaps between snippets without closing the current preformatted text area and opening a new one.
trans-unit.target: \codeline命令插入一行空白的预格式化文本。它用于在片段之间插入空白,而不需要关闭当前的预格式化文本区域并打开一个新的区域。

trans-unit.source: The \contentspage command links the current page to a table of contents page. The command follows the same syntax and argument convention as the \previouspage command.
trans-unit.target: \ contentspage命令将当前页面链接到目录页面。该命令与\ previouspage命令遵循相同的语法和参数约定。

trans-unit.source: The \default command is for marking a QML property as the default property. The word default is displayed in the documentation of the property.
trans-unit.target: \ default命令用于将QML属性标记为default属性。这个词 default 显示属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: The \ditamap command is for creating a DITA map using qdoc commands. The \ditamap command is a kind of \page command that produces a
trans-unit.target: \ditamap命令用于使用qdoc命令创建一个DITA地图。\ditamap命令是一种\page命令,它可以生成一个 "DITA "地图。

trans-unit.source: The \div and \enddiv commands delimit a large or small block of text (which may include other QDoc commands) to which special formatting attributes should be applied.
trans-unit.target: \div和\enddiv命令限定了一个大的或小的文本块(可能包括其他QDoc命令),这些文本块应该应用特殊的格式属性。

trans-unit.source: The \dontdocument command is only used in a dontdocument.qdoc file for a particular module. This file specifies publically declared classes or structs that are not meant to be documented. QDoc will not print warnings about missing \class comments for these classes and structs.
trans-unit.target: \dontdocument命令只在特定模块的dontdocument.qdoc文件中使用。这个文件指定了公开声明的类或结构,这些类或结构并不打算被记录下来,QDoc不会打印这些类和结构的缺失的class注释的警告。QDoc不会打印关于这些类和结构的缺失的class注释的警告。

trans-unit.source: The \dots command indicates that parts of the source file have been omitted when quoting a file.
trans-unit.target: \dots命令表示在引用文件时省略了源文件的部分内容。

trans-unit.source: The \e QPushButton's checked property is false by default.
trans-unit.target: QPushButton的checked属性默认为false。

trans-unit.source: The \e command renders its argument in a special font, normally italics. This command used to be called \i, which is now deprecated.
trans-unit.target: ie命令用一种特殊的字体来渲染它的参数,通常是斜体。这条命令过去叫作"\i",现在已经废弃。

trans-unit.source: The \else command can only be used within \if...\endif commands, but is useful when there is only two alternatives.
trans-unit.target: \ else命令只能在\ if ... \ endif命令中使用，但是在只有两个替代方法时很有用。

trans-unit.source: The \else command can only be used within \if...\endif commands, but is useful when there is only two alternatives.
trans-unit.target: \ else命令只能在\ if ... \ endif命令中使用，但是在只有两个替代方法时很有用。

trans-unit.source: The \else command specifies an alternative if the condition in the \if command is false.
trans-unit.target: 所述\别的命令指定了一个选择，如果在条件\如果命令是假的。

trans-unit.source: The \else command specifies an alternative if the condition in the \if command is false.
trans-unit.target: 所述\别的命令指定了一个选择，如果在条件\如果命令是假的。

trans-unit.source: The \endif command and the corresponding \if command enclose parts of a QDoc comment that will be included if the condition specified by the \if command's argument is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果由\ if命令的参数指定的条件为true ，则\ endif命令和相应的\ if命令将包含QDoc注释的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The \endif command and the corresponding \if command enclose parts of a QDoc comment that will be included if the condition specified by the \if command's argument is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果由\ if命令的参数指定的条件为true ，则\ endif命令和相应的\ if命令将包含QDoc注释的各个部分。

trans-unit.source: The \footnote and \endfootnote commands delimit a footnote.
trans-unit.target: footnote和endfootnote命令对脚注进行定界。

trans-unit.source: The \generatelist command expands to a list of links to the documentation entities in a group. Below is an example from the Qt Reference Documentation:
trans-unit.target: \generatelist命令扩展为一组文档实体的链接列表。下面是Qt参考文档中的一个例子。

trans-unit.source: The \header command indicates that the following table cells are the current table's column headers.
trans-unit.target: \header命令表示以下表格单元格是当前表格的列头。

trans-unit.source: The \if command and the corresponding \endif command enclose parts of a QDoc comment that only will be included if the condition specified by the command's argument is true.
trans-unit.target: if命令和相应的endif命令包含了QDoc注释的一部分,只有当命令参数指定的条件为真时才会被包含。

trans-unit.source: The \image command expands to the image specified by its first argument, and renders it centered as a separate paragraph.
trans-unit.target: image命令扩展到第一个参数所指定的图像,并将其作为一个单独的段落居中。

trans-unit.source: The \include command sends all or part of the file specified by its first argument to the QDoc input stream to be processed as a QDoc comment snippet.
trans-unit.target: \include命令将第一个参数指定的文件的全部或部分发送到QDoc输入流中,作为QDoc注释片段进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The \ingroup command indicates that the given overview or documented class belongs to a certain group of related docmentation.
trans-unit.target: \ingroup命令表示给定的概述或文档类属于某个相关文档组。

trans-unit.source: The \ingroup command's argument is a group name, but note that the command considers the rest of the line as part of its argument. Make sure that the group name is followed by a linebreak.
trans-unit.target: \ingroup命令的参数是一个组名,但请注意,该命令将该行的其余部分作为其参数的一部分。确保组名后面有一个换行符。

trans-unit.source: The \inheaderfile meta-command is used for overriding the include statement generated for a C++ class, namespace, or header file reference documentation.
trans-unit.target: inheaderfile元命令用于覆盖为C++类、命名空间或头文件引用文档生成的include语句。

trans-unit.source: The \inherits command is for documenting that one QML type inherits some other QML type. It must be included in the inheriting element's \qmltype comment. The argument is the name of the inherited QML type.
trans-unit.target: \ inherits命令用于记录一种QML类型继承了另一种QML类型的情况。它必须包含在继承元素的\ qmltype注释中。参数是继承的QML类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The \uicontrol command is used to mark content as being used for UI control elements. When using HTML, the output is rendered in bold.

trans-unit.source: The \underline command renders its argument underlined.

trans-unit.source: The \unicode command allows you to insert an arbitrary Unicode character in the document.

trans-unit.source: The ability to declare enumerations in QML was introduced in Qt 5.10.

trans-unit.source: The ability to import a local directory is convenient for cases such as in-application component sets and application prototyping, although any code that imports such modules must update their relevant import statements if the module directory moves to another location. This can be avoided if QML modules are used instead, as an installed module is imported with a unique identifier string rather than a file system path.
trans-unit.target: 导入本地目录的功能对于应用程序内组件集和应用程序原型之类的情况很方便，尽管如果模块目录移动到另一个位置，导入此类模块的任何代码都必须更新其相关的 import 语句。如果改用QML模块，则可以避免这种情况，因为导入的模块是使用唯一的标识符字符串而不是文件系统路径导入的。

trans-unit.source: The ability to import a local directory is convenient for cases such as in-application component sets and application prototyping, although any code that imports such modules must update their relevant import statements if the module directory moves to another location. This can be avoided if QML modules are used instead, as an installed module is imported with a unique identifier string rather than a file system path.
trans-unit.target: 导入本地目录的功能对于应用程序内组件集和应用程序原型之类的情况很方便，尽管如果模块目录移至另一个位置，则导入此类模块的任何代码都必须更新其相关的 import 语句。如果改用QML模块，则可以避免这种情况，因为导入的模块是使用唯一的标识符字符串而不是文件系统路径导入的。

trans-unit.source: The ability to import a local directory is convenient for cases such as in-application component sets and application prototyping, although any code that imports such modules must update their relevant import statements if the module directory moves to another location. This can be avoided if QML modules are used instead, as an installed module is imported with a unique identifier string rather than a file system path.
trans-unit.target: 导入本地目录的功能对于应用程序内组件集和应用程序原型之类的情况很方便，尽管如果模块目录移至另一个位置，则导入此类模块的任何代码都必须更新其相关的 import 语句。如果改用QML模块，则可以避免这种情况，因为导入的模块是使用唯一的标识符字符串而不是文件系统路径导入的。

trans-unit.source: The ability to inject C++ data into a QML object is made possible by the QQmlContext class. This class exposes data to the context of a QML object so that the data can be referred to directly from within the scope of the QML code.
trans-unit.target: QQmlContext类使将C ++数据注入QML对象成为可能。此类将数据公开给QML对象的上下文，以便可以直接从QML代码的范围内引用数据。

trans-unit.source: The ability to provide pixmaps or artwork for high resolution. For more details, see Drawing High Resolution Versions of Pixmaps and Images.
trans-unit.target: 提供高分辨率的像素图或图稿的能力。有关更多详细信息，请参见绘制高分辨率版本的Pixmap和图像。

trans-unit.source: The ability to set an amplitude, overshoot, or period depends on the QEasingCurve type. Amplitude access is available to curves that behave as springs such as elastic and bounce curves. Changing the amplitude changes the height of the curve. Period access is only available to elastic curves and setting a higher period slows the rate of bounce. Only curves that have "boomerang" behaviors such as the InBack, OutBack, InOutBack, and OutInBack have overshoot settings. These curves will interpolate beyond the end points and return to the end point, acting similar to a boomerang.
trans-unit.target: 设置幅度，超调或周期的能力取决于QEasingCurve类型。幅度访问可用于表现为弹簧的曲线，例如弹性曲线和弹跳曲线。改变幅度会改变曲线的高度。周期访问仅适用于弹性曲线，设置较高的周期会减慢反弹速度。只有具有“回旋镖”行为（例如InBack，OutBack，InOutBack和OutInBack）的曲线才具有过冲设置。这些曲线将插值到端点之外并返回到端点，其作用类似于回旋镖。

trans-unit.source: The ability to set an amplitude, overshoot, or period depends on the QEasingCurve type. Amplitude access is available to curves that behave as springs such as elastic and bounce curves. Changing the amplitude changes the height of the curve. Period access is only available to elastic curves and setting a higher period slows the rate of bounce. Only curves that have "boomerang" behaviors such as the InBack, OutBack, InOutBack, and OutInBack have overshoot settings. These curves will interpolate beyond the end points and return to the end point, acting similar to a boomerang.
trans-unit.target: 设置幅度，超调或周期的能力取决于QEasingCurve类型。振幅访问可用于表现为弹簧的曲线，例如弹性曲线和弹跳曲线。改变幅度会改变曲线的高度。周期访问仅适用于弹性曲线，设置较高的周期会减慢反弹速度。只有具有“回旋镖”行为（例如InBack，OutBack，InOutBack和OutInBack）的曲线才具有过冲设置。这些曲线将插值到端点之外，然后返回到端点，其作用类似于回旋镖。

trans-unit.source: The above code sets up a PostgreSQL connection and instantiates a QPSQLDriver object. Next, addDatabase() is called to add the connection to the known connections so that it can be used by the Qt SQL classes. When a driver is instantiated with a connection handle (or set of handles), Qt assumes that you have already opened the database connection.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码建立了PostgreSQL连接并实例化了QPSQLDriver对象。接下来，调用addDatabase（）将连接添加到已知连接中，以便Qt SQL类可以使用它。当使用连接句柄（或一组句柄）实例化驱动程序时，Qt假定您已经打开了数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: The above code sets up a PostgreSQL connection and instantiates a QPSQLDriver object. Next, addDatabase() is called to add the connection to the known connections so that it can be used by the Qt SQL classes. When a driver is instantiated with a connection handle (or set of handles), Qt assumes that you have already opened the database connection.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码设置了一个PostgreSQL连接并实例化了一个QPSQLDriver对象。接下来,调用addDatabase()将连接添加到已知的连接中,以便它可以被Qt SQL类使用。当用连接句柄(或句柄集)实例化一个驱动程序时,Qt假定你已经打开了数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: The above code shows another way to intercept Tab key press events sent to a particular target widget. In this case, the filter handles the relevant events and returns true to stop them from being processed any further. All other events are ignored, and the filter returns false to allow them to be sent on to the target widget, via any other event filters that are installed on it.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码显示了另一种拦截发送到特定目标小部件的Tab键按下事件的方法。在这种情况下，过滤器将处理相关事件并返回 true ,以阻止对其进行进一步处理。所有其他事件都将被忽略，并且过滤器返回 false ,以允许它们通过安装在其上的任何其他事件过滤器发送到目标小部件。

trans-unit.source: The above diagram illustrates how Qt Quick 3D fits into the larger Qt graphics stack. Qt Quick 3D works as an extension to the 2D Qt Quick API, and when using 3D scene items in conjunction with View3D the scene will be rendered via the Qt Rendering Hardware Interface (RHI). The RHI will translate API calls into the correct native rendering hardware API calls for a given platform. The diagram above shows the options available for each platform. If no native backend is explicitly defined, then Qt Quick will default to a sensible native backend for rendering for each platform.
trans-unit.target: 上图说明了Qt Quick 3D如何适合较大的Qt图形堆栈。Qt Quick 3D是2D Qt Quick API的扩展，当将3D场景项与View3D结合使用时，将通过Qt渲染硬件接口（RHI）渲染场景。RHI将API调用转换为给定平台的正确的本机渲染硬件API调用。上图显示了每个平台可用的选项。如果未明确定义本机后端，则Qt Quick将默认为明智的本机后端，以便为每个平台进行渲染。

trans-unit.source: The above is sufficient to enable the application to access :/wobble.frag.qsb at run time. The original Vulkan-style GLSL source code (wobble.frag) is not included in the application's executable and does not need to be shipped. If there are errors in the shader code, the glslang compiler messages are printed at build time and the build fails. When changing the shader source file, the changes are picked up automatically in the next build, like they would for C++ and other source files.
trans-unit.target: 上面的内容足以使应用程序在运行时访问 :/wobble.frag.qsb 。原始的Vulkan风格GLSL源代码（wobble.frag）不包含在应用程序的可执行文件中，不需要附带。如果着色器代码中有错误，则在构建时将打印 glslang 编译器消息，并且构建失败。更改着色器源文件时，更改将在下一个版本中自动获取，就像对C ++和其他源文件一样。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path name consists of the full path and the file name. On Unix this will always begin with the root, '/', directory. QFileInfo will uppercase drive letters. Note that QDir does not do this. The code snippet below shows this.
trans-unit.target: 绝对路径名由完整路径和文件名组成。在Unix上，它将始终以根目录“ /”开头。在Windows上，它将始终以“ D：/”开头，其中D是驱动器号，但未映射到驱动器号的网络共享除外，在这种情况下，路径将以“ // sharename /”开头。QFileInfo将大写驱动器号。请注意，QDir不会这样做。下面的代码段显示了这一点。

trans-unit.source: The accessibility is managed by QAccessible's static functions, which we will examine shortly. trans-unit.source: The accuracy also depends on the timer type. For Qt::PreciseTimer, QTimer will try to keep the accuracy at 1 millisecond. Precise timers will also never time out earlier than expected.
trans-unit.target: 精度还取决于计时器类型。对于Qt :: PreciseTimer，QTimer将尝试将精度保持在1毫秒。精确的计时器也永远不会比预期的超时。

trans-unit.source: The accuracy also depends on the timer type. For Qt::PreciseTimer, QTimer will try to keep the accuracy at 1 millisecond. Precise timers will also never time out earlier than expected.
trans-unit.target: 精度还取决于计时器类型。对于Qt :: PreciseTimer，QTimer将尝试将精度保持在1毫秒。精确的计时器也永远不会比预期的超时。

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of each reading is measured as a number from 0 to 1. A value of 1 is the highest level that the device can support and 0 is the worst.
trans-unit.target: 每个读数的精度以0到1的数字来衡量。1的值是设备能够支持的最高级别,0是最差级别。

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the provided altitude value, in meters.

trans-unit.target: 所提供的经纬度值的精度,以米为单位。

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of timers depends on the underlying operating system and hardware. Most platforms support a resolution of 1 millisecond, though the accuracy of the timer will not equal this resolution in many real-world situations.
trans-unit.target: 定时器的精度取决于底层操作系统和硬件。大多数平台都支持1毫秒的分辨率,不过在许多实际情况下,定时器的精度不会等于这个分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The accuracy value represents the resolution of the sensor. It is the smallest change the sensor can detect and is expressed using the same units as the minimum and maximum.
trans-unit.target: 精度值代表传感器的分辨率。它是传感器能够检测到的最小变化,使用与最小和最大相同的单位表示。

trans-unit.source: The acquire methods return a pointer to the replica QObject instantiated by the node. The node has no way of knowing the intended lifetime of the replica, so it is the responsibility of the calling program to delete the replica when it is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 获取方法返回一个指向由节点实例化的副本QObject的指针。节点无法知道副本的预期寿命，因此调用程序有责任在不再需要副本时删除副本。

trans-unit.source: The acquire methods return a pointer to the replica QObject instantiated by the node. The node has no way of knowing the replica's intended lifetime. Consequently, when the replica is not longer needed, it is the calling program's responsibility to delete it.
trans-unit.target: 获取方法返回一个指向由节点实例化的副本QObject的指针。该节点无法知道副本的预期生存期。因此，当不再需要该副本时，调用程序有责任删除它。

trans-unit.source: The act of binding the VAO in the render function has the effect of restoring all of the vertex data state setup in the initialization phase. In this way we can set a great deal of state when setting up a VAO and efficiently switch between state sets of objects to be rendered. Using VAOs also allows the OpenGL driver to amortise the validation checks of the vertex data.
trans-unit.target: 在渲染函数中绑定VAO的行为,具有恢复初始化阶段所有顶点数据状态设置的效果。这样一来,我们可以在设置VAO时设置大量的状态,并有效地在要渲染的对象的状态集之间进行切换。使用VAO还可以让OpenGL驱动程序摊开顶点数据的验证检查。

trans-unit.source: The act of monitoring files and directories for modifications consumes system resources. This implies there is a limit to the number of files and directories your process can monitor simultaneously. On all BSD variants, for example, an open file descriptor is required for each monitored file. Some system limits the number of open file descriptors to 256 by default. This means that addPath() and addPaths() will fail if your process tries to add more than 256 files or directories to the file system monitor. Also note that your process may have other file descriptors open in addition to the ones for files being monitored, and these other open descriptors also count in the total. macOS uses a different backend and does not suffer from this issue.
trans-unit.target: 监视文件和目录以进行修改的行为消耗了系统资源。这意味着您的进程可以同时监视的文件和目录数量受到限制。例如，在所有BSD变体上，每个受监视文件都需要一个打开的文件描述符。某些系统默认情况下将打开文件描述符的数量限制为256。这意味着，如果您的进程尝试向文件系统监视器中添加256个以上的文件或目录，则addPath（）和addPaths（）将失败。还要注意，您的进程可能会打开除要监视的文件之外的其他文件描述符，这些其他打开的描述符也计入总数。macOS使用不同的后端，因此不会遇到此问题。

trans-unit.source: The act of monitoring files and directories for modifications consumes system resources. This implies there is a limit to the number of files and directories your process can monitor simultaneously. On all BSD variants, for example, an open file descriptor is required for each monitored file. Some system limits the number of open file descriptors to 256 by default. This means that addPath() and addPaths() will fail if your process tries to add more than 256 files or directories to the file system monitor. Also note that your process may have other file descriptors open in addition to the ones for files being monitored, and these other open descriptors also count in the total. macOS uses a different backend and does not suffer from this issue.
trans-unit.target: 监视文件和目录以进行修改的行为消耗了系统资源。这意味着您的进程可以同时监视的文件和目录数量是有限的。例如，在所有BSD变体上，每个受监视文件都需要一个打开的文件描述符。某些系统默认情况下将打开文件描述符的数量限制为256。这意味着，如果您的进程尝试将超过256个文件或目录添加到文件系统监视器，则addPath（）和addPaths（）将失败。另请注意，除了要监视的文件的描述符外，您的进程可能还会打开其他文件描述符，这些其他打开的描述符也计入总数。macOS使用不同的后端，因此不会遇到此问题。

trans-unit.source: The actual help data, meaning the table of contents, index keywords, or HTML documents, is contained in Qt compressed help files. So, one such a help file represents usually one manual or documentation set. Since most products are more comprehensive and consist of a number of tools, one manual is rarely enough. Instead, more manuals, which should be accessible at the same time, exist. Ideally, it should also be possible to reference certain points of interest of one manual to another. Therefore, the Qt help system operates on help collection files, which include any number of compressed help files.
trans-unit.target: 实际的帮助数据,也就是目录、索引关键字或HTML文档,都包含在Qt压缩帮助文件中。所以,一个这样的帮助文件通常代表了一个手册或文档集。由于大多数产品都比较全面,由许多工具组成,所以很少有一本手册就够了。取而代之的是更多的手册,这些手册应该是可以同时访问的。理想情况下,还应该可以将一个手册的某些兴趣点引用到另一个手册中。因此,Qt帮助系统是在帮助集合文件上运行的,其中包括任何数量的压缩帮助文件。
